TopicTitle: Blowing my space station out of the sky!

Articles.Content:
Due to a paperwork error, Kerbin's sole orbital refueling depot has been targeted for early decommissioning with the crew still on board! The administration's weapon of choice? The new and improved Kessler Bomb. With over 100 spare fuel tanks bolted onto the side, when "fired", much of that debris will be sent forward. When properly timed, it will reliably shred to pieces any large orbiting object it comes into contact with.

Enjoy!
The good thing about lag is that you get to enjoy explosions in slow motion
